name: Interface MetaEventListener
text:
The MetaEventListener interface should be implemented by classes
 whose instances need to be notified when a Sequencer has processed a
 MetaMessage. To register a MetaEventListener object to
 receive such notifications, pass it as the argument to the
 addMetaEventListener method of Sequencer.

methods.description:
Invoked when a Sequencer has encountered and processed a
 MetaMessage in the Sequence it is processing.
